text: switched from coffee to macha - best decision I've made in a long time. Less stressed overall.

elements.text: switched from coffee to macha - best decision I've made in a long time. Less stressed overall.

text: Interesting - did you choose matcha over tea due to the caffeine content?

elements.text: Interesting - did you choose matcha over tea due to the caffeine content?

text:
I think it does have more caffeine than tea which is a plus. But it tastes really good. I drink coffee black so I like it kinda of thick and bitter, macha gives me more of that. Except macha isn't bitter at all, a little acidic/irony, but in a good way. Supposedly it's healthier than tea too - I'm a little skeptical of that but I like it.

My favorite tea is probably jasmine green tea. So hard to find good loose leaf though. Best is in tea-houses, but those are hard to find!

text: chemists tend to be pretty ridiculous coffee drinkers, its hard on your stomach. Especially if you miss breakfast consistently or forget to eat. Tea is much easier :smile: - but I do miss the bitterness sometimes.
